Package view

Class ViewImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.ViewImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewInterface
    public class ViewImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewInterface
    The ViewImpl class implements the View Interface of this application. It defines all the methods necessary for the program to interact with the user.

    • Method Detail

      • displayMenu

        public void displayMenu()
        Description copied from interface: ViewInterface
        Method to display the below options to the user. 1. Create a new portfolio 2. Display composition of a portfolio 3. Check value of a portfolio on a particular date 4. Option to buy or sell stocks for flexible portfolios 5. View the cost basis of a portfolio 6. View the performance of a portfolio 7. Exit the application.
        Specified by:
        displayMenu in interface ViewInterface

      • takeTickerName

        public void takeTickerName()
        Description copied from interface: ViewInterface
        Method to tell the user to input a ticker name. Ticker name is the name of the stock as listed on NASDAQ.
        Specified by:
        takeTickerName in interface ViewInterface
